title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: The Grove Fillmore
directions: between California St and Pine St
content: This cafe style restaurant has got a wholesome Californian menu with staples like salads, bagels, sandwiches, cheese plates, etc.  They also do a very affordable breakfast where you can get options like "Huevos Rancheros" and "Country baked eggs" for under 10 bucks.
